terra.shell.emulation.concurrency.helper

Class SerializableImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Image
      • java.awt.image.BufferedImage
        • terra.shell.emulation.concurrency.helper.BufferedImageNonserializableConstructor
          • terra.shell.emulation.concurrency.helper.SerializableImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.RenderedImage, java.awt.image.WritableRenderedImage, java.awt.Transparency, java.io.Serializable

    public class SerializableImage
extends BufferedImageNonserializableConstructor
implements java.io.Serializable
    Creates an Image object that can be serialized, and de-serialized
    Author:
    schirripad@moravian.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
